articles.title: Early data show two doses of Oxford/AstraZeneca vaccine provoked good immune response - Reuters Canada
articles.description: Oxford University's COVID-19 vaccine candidate has a better immune response when a two full-dose regime is used rather than a full-dose followed by a half-dose booster, the university said on Thursday, citing data from early trials.
articles.content:
By Reuters Staff
FILE PHOTO: A test tube labeled with the vaccine is seen in front of AstraZeneca logo in this illustration taken, September 9, 2020. REUTERS/Dado Ruvic/File Photo/File Photo
